mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE bd_type = #{bd_type} AND bd_del = 'N' ORDER BY bd_num desc;
SELECT * FROM board WHERE bd_num = #{bd_num} AND bd_del = 'N';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bd_title, bd_contents, bd_reg_date, bd_type, bd_me_id, bd_ori_num, bd_del) SELECT #{board.bd_title},#{board.bd_contents},NOW(),#{board.bd_type},#{board.bd_me_id}, ifnull(max(bd_num),0)+1, 'N' FROM board;
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET bd_title = #{board.bd_title}, bd_contents = #{board.bd_contents}, bd_up_date = NOW() WHERE bd_num = #{board.bd_num};
UPDATE board SET bd_del = 'Y', bd_del_date = NOW() WHERE bd_num = #{bd_num};
